greeting: My favorite languages are Rust and Pascal!
I look like an NPC with this messages...
Nope I don't use wordpress, I hate PHP.
My first program was a discord bot written in Python... From my phone.
home.body:
Welcome to my personal (developer) page!

Here I plan to save things about me, like what music I like listening to, my personal projects, my story and much more.

I intend to make this site a safe place for me to express myself and share things I enjoy, but also to help others on their journey and finding things that they like, so take a look around and see if anything catches your attention.

If you want to chat with me or tell me anything feel free to hit me up on Twitter!

about.title: About me
about.presentation:
Heya! I am Kimu, an spanish 19 year old female software engineer that loves playing around with tech stuff.

Messing around with everything has always been my thing, tearing down the family laptop, changing the leds in my controller, or soldering a new jack to my mp3.

I'm kind of an introvert, but I do like talking to people, from time to time.
